DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare C13-CAC Breath Test with 24-hour Gastric pH Monitoring in Patients with Gastric Acid-related Diseases and Healthy Volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Study Between C13-CAC Breath Test and 24-hour Gastric pH Monitoring
DOC.criteria: Patients with Gastric Acidrelated diseases like peptic ulcer or gastroesophageal reflux disease in investigator's judgment Healthy subjects who are determined no history of Helicobacter pylori infections Patients with hypercalcemia Patients with hypothyroidism Patients with hyperparathyroidism History of upper gastrointestinal surgery or resection Any condition would limit the subject's ability to complete 24hour gastric pH monitoring
